title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 110
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 110

State Regulations

Denial Of Application

For Approval To Operate

Drug Abuse Treatment And/Or

Preventive Education Programs
___________
(Voluntary Agency) having made application to the New York

State Drug

Abuse Control Commission for approval to operate a drug abuse
treatment and/or preventive education program, and due deliberation having been
had thereon, such application is hereby denied for the following
reasons: YOU ARE HEREBY GIVEN NOTICE that pursuant to the provisions of

Chapter XXV of Title 14 NYCRR
2020.11
you may, within thirty days of the date
hereof, request the Commission to grant a hearing to review this denial of your
application. Any such request shall be made in writing and served upon the

Commission at its address shown below. Dated:________
____________
Secretary for: New York State

Drug Abuse Control

Commission

Albany, New York 12203

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app
110

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
